name: Colibri Page Builder
author: ExtendThemes

sections.description:
Colibri Page Builder adds drag and drop page builder functionality to the ColibriWP theme.

sections.reviews:
Fast and clear response

By mariette62 on March 5, 2024

I have used the Kolibrie theme before for another website. I love all the features and posibilities this theme has to offer. This is the second time I had a question and like before the answer was fast and my options to resolve the issue clear. This is the reason I suggested this theme for my current employer as well.

VERY BAD CUSTOMER SERVICE

By movizz on October 12, 2023

I am soooo disappointed by the service of this plug in. The customer service takes many days to reply which is tooo slow and they also reply to HALF of your questions which push you to send emails AGAIN and AGAIN without even resolving your issue. There is no proper assistance AT ALL! Plus the plug in is not compatible with any other plug in which RUINS all your designs... and even worse, they cannot restore your designs that you lost so you have to do them AGAIN AND AGAIN, this is RIDICULOUS!! Also, it is not very complete, many BASIC features are missing such as the carousel (they don't have a carousel this is just and image next to another) and others... no proper answer from them which is even more disappointing. Better to save your money and use only the free version to not waste your time, money and energy... or go for other Big builders that have a proper assistance. I regret buying they product and working on my website with it for over 2 months, now I need to buy from their competitors and do everything from the BEGINNING!

a real alternative

By frankseltmann on August 29, 2023

I've been using Colibri in the full version for 3 years now and can no longer imagine a project realization without the plugin/theme. But you can also build very nice websites in the Lite version.
It is also important that the support responds very quickly and has a solution for every problem so far.

Great way to create websites

By winterworks on April 26, 2023

I really like the colibri page builder. The great templates coming with it, global design schemes, integrated header and footer builder, loading google fonts locally without an extra plugin, as well as good pricing, offering a lifetime subscription.

However, a few functions competitors are offering are missing. For example import/export of reusable sections or having identical sections on multiple pages aside from header/footer.

Colibri PRO broken after update

By miguelfra on March 11, 2023

I purchased Colibri PRO in Dec 2022 and used Althea to build a site. I recently went back and tried to edit the site and the editor is completely broken. I cannot click on half the menu buttons or in any of the fields on the WYSIWYG editor.

Is this caused by my 1 year subscription running out or by an update? I did notice early on that I could no longer edit from my Mac but I was able to do so from a PC. Now I cannot edit from either. I have automatic updates enabled on so I have the latest iterations of WP, Calibri and the theme.

I do not have any other editors enabled and I am distressed because a client is expecting a change on their Web site which I cannot do.

Awful

By thebrunorocha on December 14, 2022

The plugin installed along with the template. I went along designing with VERY limited free resources only to reach the footer and learn that unless I paid for the "Pro" version, I had to keep the copyright as it is. Lost 8 hours of work.

Good Plugin

By jero640511 on November 6, 2022

Hello is a good Page Builder perfect for the blogs and showcase sites

Do Not Recommend - Poor Support + Very Bad User Experience

By Ben (benrfairless) on November 3, 2022

I have had to raise multiple support requests asking multiple questions about both the theme and the plugin. Most of those requests have been responded to with one sentence answers, and the team take a very long time to respond. They advertise "Pro" support however I don't believe the support we are getting is anything like that.

very bad, it's a trash

By mari123o on October 15, 2022

I have tested one theme from this company. Immediately slow down my website, and have no functionality inside. I do not recommend it. And looks ugly. They should be retired. they wasted my time.

Doesn't Work anymore

By antonioagliano on July 6, 2022

I downloaded colibri last year. I just use the free version 'cause at that moment was enough for what I intended to do. Just today I noticed that in the last month all the features of the free version have been blocked. Even changing the font or color of heading and paragraphs is not allowed anymore. Adding features or boxes in not allowed anymore. Everything has been locked. After a users created 1 or 2 or 10 websites, you cannot delete all this options. This free options are what attracted all this users to your plug-in. Off course now all of this users have (in theory) to buy your PRO version or just change editor. Shamefull I'm updating my review since the Colibri Team has helped me to fix the issue which was related to conflicts between plug-ins after some update. Everything work as usual now.
